properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:28AM MST until February 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Cascade and Judith Basin.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow will increase by
this afternoon as gusty west to southwest winds develop. Exposed
areas with a substantial snow cover will see the greatest
impacts, including Highway 87 from Belt to Hobson and Highway
89 south to Monarch.
properties.instruction:
Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY
